title: JugglinDan's Dragonbane Timekeeping
description:
Dragonbane Timekeeping (DB Time) implements simple timekeeping for the Dragonbane game system on top of the Global Progress Clocks module. It has the following main features:
  • Tracks the time in stretches and shifts, and optionally in hours and days.
  • Can post the time in hours and minutes and day to chat.
  • Provides hooks for easy customisation when the time changes.
  • Can be easily modified for other game systems.
  • Never takes control away from the GM. This module keeps track of the time, but the GM is always in charge of the rate at which time advances.
